allArrivalCall.title: Entry Call 1
allArrivalCall.description: This is the very first call a pilot makes to an airport's air traffic controller when entering their airspace to request an approach for landing.
allArrivalCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, descending 4000 feet, 20DME inboud DAC
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, {descend 3000ft}, {QNH 1013} report established 12DME arc for DIA-14

allArrivalCall.title: Entry Call 2
allArrivalCall.description: A pilot makes this call to the airport controller when they are nearing the airport, to request permission to begin a descent and prepare for landing.
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, {descend 3000ft}, {QNH 1013} report over VOR proceeding outbound of letdown for VDI-14
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: {QNH 1013}, {descend 3000ft}, call you established outbound of letdown for VDI 14 {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: Entry Call (Training Area)
allArrivalCall.description: This call is made by a pilot who has just finished training in a designated area and is requesting to re-enter the airport's main traffic pattern for a landing.
allArrivalCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, descending 4000 feet, like to leave training area east, request rejoin instruction
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, {descend 3000ft}, {QNH 1013} report over VOR proceeding outbound of letdown for VDI-14
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: {QNH 1013}, {descend 3000ft}, call you established outbound of letdown for VDI 14 {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: VOR Outbound
allArrivalCall.description: This call is made when a plane has flown directly over a VOR (a radio beacon used for navigation) and is now flying away from it to set up for the final landing approach.
allArrivalCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, over VOR proceeding outbound of letdown
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, clear for the approach, {descend 3000ft}, report turning inbound
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: Roger, cleared for the approach, {descend 3000ft}, call you turning inbound {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: Outbound to Localizer
allArrivalCall.description: This call is made when a plane begins a turn to line up with the runway after flying away from the VOR, starting the final straight part of the approach.
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: call you established localizer, rwy 14 {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: Localizer to 6DME 1
allArrivalCall.description: This is a call that happens when a plane is already perfectly lined up with the runway and has reached a distance of 6 miles, confirming it is on the correct path for landing.

allArrivalCall.title: 12 DME Arc to R300
allArrivalCall.description: This call is made by a pilot when they are flying a curved path, called an 'arc,' around the airport and have reached a specific radial (a navigational line) that marks their next turn.

allArrivalCall.title: 12 DME Arc to R355
allArrivalCall.description: This call is made by a pilot when they are flying a curved path, called an 'arc,' around the airport and have reached a specific radial (a navigational line) that marks their next turn.

allArrivalCall.title: R300 to Localizer
allArrivalCall.description: This is the call a pilot makes after completing a turn from a curved approach path to line up on the final, straight path to the runway.
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, clear for the approach, {descend 3000ft} report established localizer runway 14
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: call you established localizer, rwy 14 {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: R355 to Localizer
allArrivalCall.description: This is the call a pilot makes after completing a turn from a curved approach path to line up on the final, straight path to the runway.
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, clear for the approach, {descend 3000ft} report established localizer runway 14
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: call you established localizer, rwy 14 {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: Localizer to 6DME 2
allArrivalCall.description: This is a call that happens when a plane is already perfectly lined up with the runway and has reached a distance of 6 miles, confirming it is on the correct path for landing.

allArrivalCall.title: Final Approach
allArrivalCall.description: This is the final call before landing, made by a pilot who is 6 miles away from the runway, to receive landing clearance and information about the wind.
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked, surface wind 230/05 knots, cleared to land runway-14
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: gears green, s/w copied, Cleared to land {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: Landed & Taxi
allArrivalCall.description: A pilot makes this call immediately after the plane has touched down on the runway, to let the controller know they have landed and to get instructions on where to taxi next.
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, landed 1200, taxi via S1, after vacating contact ground 121.8
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: taxi via S1, after vacating change to ground 121.8, call you vacated the runway {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: Vacated to Parking
allArrivalCall.description: This is a call made after a plane has completely left the main runway and is on a taxiway, to get directions to its final parking spot.
allArrivalCall.initialCall: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, runway vacated via S1
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, Taxi via S1-S-C to Stand no 5
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: roger, taxi via S1-S-C to Stand no 5 {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: Vacated to Termarc
allArrivalCall.description: This is a call made after a plane has completely left the main runway and is on a taxiway, to get directions to the terminal area for passengers to disembark.
allArrivalCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, runway vacated via SA
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, Taxi via SA to termarc, change to ground 121.8
allArrivalCall.feedbackCall: taxi via SA, changing to ground 121.8 {Call Sign}

allArrivalCall.title: Fly Away (3 Miles)
allArrivalCall.description: This is a special call made during a low-altitude pass over the runway before a pilot performs a 'fly away' rather than landing. It's used to confirm the pilot will continue their approach before making the final turn to fly away.
allArrivalCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, continue appraoch, expect to bearing to the right at 3 miles

allArrivalCall.title: Fly Away
allArrivalCall.description: This is the final call made to an airport's tower before leaving their airspace after a low pass, informing them of the pilot's intention to change to another controller.
allArrivalCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, we are at 3 miles turning right, changing to tejgaon

allDepartureCall.title: Startup
allDepartureCall.description: A pilot makes this call to the ground controller to request permission to start the plane's engines. This is the first step before a flight.
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, startup approved, temp 32, time 40, push to face north

allDepartureCall.title: Pushback
allDepartureCall.description: This is a call to the ground controller to request permission to be pushed back from the gate by a special ground vehicle.
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, pushback approved, push to face north
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: copied, push to face north, {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Startup & Pushback
allDepartureCall.description: A pilot makes this single call to request permission for both starting the engines and being pushed back from the gate at the same time.
allDepartureCall.initialCall: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, request startup and pushback
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, startup and pushback approved, temp 32, time 40, push to face north
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: copied, startup and pushback approved, temp 32, time 40, push to face north {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Taxi
allDepartureCall.description: This is a call made by a pilot to the ground controller to request permission to move the plane on the ground from the gate to the runway.
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, taxi via C-N-N2 to holding point runway-14, {QNH 1013}, Squawk 4771
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: {QNH 1013}, Squawk 4771, taxi via C-N-N2 to holding point runway-14 {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Military Taxi
allDepartureCall.description: This is a specific call made by a military pilot to the ground controller to request permission to move the plane on the ground from the gate to the runway, following a designated route for military aircraft.
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, taxi via NA-P to holding point runway-14, QNH 760, SQUAWK 4771
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: QNH 760, SQUAWK 4141, taxi via NA-P to holding point runway-14 {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: ATC Clearance 1 (Run)
allDepartureCall.description: A pilot makes this call to the ground controller when they are approaching the runway, to get a final clearance to take off and to switch communication to the airport's tower controller.
allDepartureCall.initialCall: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, aproaching holding point rwy 14, like to change to tower
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, cleared to [Destination] SID ADMIL ONE, climb and cruse FL 290

allDepartureCall.title: ATC Clearance 2 (End)
allDepartureCall.description: A pilot makes this call to the ground controller when they are at the end of the runway and ready to take off, to get final clearance and switch to the airport's tower controller.
allDepartureCall.initialCall: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, holding point runway 14, like to change to tower

allDepartureCall.title: Line Up 1
allDepartureCall.description: This is a call made by a pilot to the tower controller to request permission to move onto the runway and prepare for takeoff.
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, line up runway 14, report ready for departure
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: line up runway 14, call you ready for departure {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Line Up 2 (Circuit)
allDepartureCall.description: A pilot makes this call to the tower controller to get permission to move onto the runway and prepare for takeoff to fly a local circuit (a repeating pattern of flight around the airport).
allDepartureCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, holding point runway 14, Request line up for cct
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, circuite approved line up runway 14, report ready for departure
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: lining up runway 14 for circuite, call you ready for departure {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Line Up 3 (Trg Area)
allDepartureCall.description: This is a call to the tower controller to get permission to move onto the runway for takeoff, with the intention of flying to a designated training area.
allDepartureCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, holding point runway 14, Request line up for training area east
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: lining up runway 14 for trg area east, call you ready for departure {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Departure
allDepartureCall.description: A pilot makes this call to the tower controller to confirm they are ready for takeoff and to get the final clearance to proceed.
allDepartureCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, SID ADMIL ONE, initially FL-130, surface wind 260/60kts, cleared for takeoff runway 14
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: s/w copied, runway 14, cleared for takeoff {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Airborne to 4DME
allDepartureCall.description: This is a call made by a pilot immediately after takeoff, reporting their new altitude and position to the tower controller to ensure they are on the correct departure path.

allDepartureCall.title: Military Airborne
allDepartureCall.description: This is a specific call made by a military pilot after takeoff, reporting their position to the tower controller as they enter the crosswind leg of the circuit (a turn in the traffic pattern).
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: airborne 1300, call you abeam victor one {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Transfer to Control
allDepartureCall.description: This is a call made when a plane has flown far enough from the airport to be handed off from the airport's tower controller to the regional air traffic controller for the next part of its flight.
allDepartureCall.feedbackCall: over to control, good day {Call Sign}

allDepartureCall.title: Transfer to Training
allDepartureCall.description: A pilot makes this call after departing, to switch from the main airport's controller to a specific controller who manages the training area.

allCircuitCall.title: Victor 1 to Field
allCircuitCall.description: This call is made by a pilot when they are flying toward a specific point, Victor 1, and are about to enter the 'field inside' portion of the circuit (the traffic pattern around the airport).
allCircuitCall.feedbackCall: call you field inside rwy 14 {Call Sign}

allCircuitCall.title: Field to Downwind
allCircuitCall.description: A pilot makes this call when the plane is now 'field inside,' flying parallel to the runway in the opposite direction of landing, and is about to turn onto the 'downwind' leg of the circuit.

allCircuitCall.title: Downwind to Base 1 (Initial)
allCircuitCall.description: This call is made when a pilot turns from flying parallel to the runway to a new turn, setting up for a specific type of approach called an 'initial' approach.

allCircuitCall.title: Downwind to Base 2 (Low Go)
allCircuitCall.description: A pilot makes this call when they are turning to set up for a 'low go' approach, which is a simulated landing where the plane flies very close to the runway before taking off again.
allCircuitCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, downwind for low go

allCircuitCall.title: Downwind to Base 3 (Land)
allCircuitCall.description: This call is made when a pilot is turning onto the 'base' leg of the circuit and is preparing for a full stop landing at the end of the maneuver.
allCircuitCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, downwind for full stop

allCircuitCall.title: Base to Final 1 (Low Go)
allCircuitCall.description: A pilot makes this call when turning from the 'base' leg onto the final straight path toward the runway, confirming their intention for a 'low go' approach.
allCircuitCall.Route: Base [for Low Go] - Final [for Low Go]
allCircuitCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, base, for low go
allCircuitCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked S/W calm, report final runway 14
allCircuitCall.feedbackCall: Gears are green, s/w copied, runway 14, call you final {Call Sign}

allCircuitCall.title: Base to Final 2 (Land)
allCircuitCall.description: A pilot makes this call when turning from the 'base' leg onto the final straight path toward the runway, confirming they will be doing a full stop landing.
allCircuitCall.Route: Down Wind - Base [for Land] - Final [For Land]
allCircuitCall.initialCall: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, base, for full stop
allCircuitCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked S/W calm, cleared to land
allCircuitCall.feedbackCall: Gears are green, s/w copied, runway 14, cleared to land {Call Sign}

allCircuitCall.title: Initial to Crosswind
allCircuitCall.description: This call is made during a 'touch-and-go' landing (touching the runway and immediately taking off again) to report entering the 'crosswind' leg of the circuit.

allCircuitCall.title: Final for Low Go
allCircuitCall.description: This is a call made when a plane is on the final, straight approach to the runway, confirming it will perform a 'low go' (a pass over the runway without landing).
allCircuitCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, recheck gears down and locked S/W calm, runway 14, cleared for low go
allCircuitCall.feedbackCall: Gears are green, s/w copied, runway 14, cleared for low go {Call Sign}

allCircuitCall.title: Final for Landing
allCircuitCall.description: This is a call made when a plane is on the final, straight approach to the runway, confirming it will perform a full stop landing.
allCircuitCall.atcCall: {Call Sign}, recheck gears down and locked S/W calm, cleared to land
allCircuitCall.feedbackCall: Gears are green, s/w copied, runway 14, cleared to land {Call Sign}

allCircuitCall.title: Crosswind to Downwind
allCircuitCall.description: This is a call made when a plane is turning from the 'crosswind' leg to the 'downwind' leg of the circuit (flying parallel to the runway in the opposite direction of landing).
